thread.title: Raiders want to be on fire for Father Ryan game
thread.title_full: Raiders want to be on fire for Father Ryan game

title: Raiders want to be on fire for Father Ryan game
text:
Raiders want to be on fire for Father Ryan game Raiders want to be on fire for Father Ryan game 
The Spring Hill High School football team rallied around a bonfire Thursday night to build toward Friday's 7 p.m. game in Nashville against Father Ryan. With the school on a fall break, the team had a bonfire and pregame meal to help gear for the school's first football game ever against the Irish. (Photo by correpsondent Vanessa Beach)
